message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but $120 is a bit steep for me.  Would you consider $100?

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob! I can see you're a serious buyer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $115. It's a fair price, considering the value you mentioned earlier.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, Alice.  How about we split the difference again and settle on $107?

I'm glad you're willing to negotiate, Bob! I can see you're a savvy buyer. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I get a fair price. I can offer it to you for $110. It's a good deal, considering the value you've already acknowledged it has.
